title: It say's I sent a *GIFT* But didnt send anything...
body: Did my account get hacked or something? weird..... i dont gift things to people and i dont have a receipt for anything? any help, I just wanna make sure my account is still okay.....

replies.body: Hmm, yeah it looks like you gifted a skin to another player a bit ago.  If this wasn't intended, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can take a look and see what's up!
